titleInfo.title: Lester Flatt and the Nashville Grass at Dougherty County High School (19537)

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Two color half-sheet (red and black on green) announcing the Bluegrass Caravan featuring Lester Flatt and the Nashville Grass, Jim and Jesse and the Virginia Boys, and the Dixie Ramblers at Dougherty County High School on February 24. Poster features metal photoplates of Lester Flatt and the Nashville Grass, Jim and Jesse, and of the sponsor, Martha White Flour Co. Poster also features a woodcut of a bluegrass caravan. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/48099/

subject.topic: Jim and Jesse and the Virginia Boys (Musical group)
